text: @BrianKempGA I like how you have been handling the Covid-19 situation in GA. I do find your recent suggestion to wear masks, however, a bit disappointing. The studies regarding their effectiveness are mostly biased (WHO funded, CDC funded, 3M funded, etc.) - dubious results I would think.
